recommended_degree: Teknik Mesin, Teknik Perawatan Mesin, Teknik Elektro (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as a Preventive Maintenance Intern and support the maintenance team in ensuring machines run smoothly. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting in preventive maintenance activities on machines and equipment.
2. Supporting the maintenance team in basic checks, cleaning, and routine servicing tasks.
3. Helping prepare and organize maintenance documents, including SOPs and Work Instructions (WIs).
4. Updating and maintaining simple maintenance records when needed.

This internship is ideal for students who want hands-on experience in machine maintenance and engineering documentation.
